statements: SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT policy_maker_id, policy_maker_name FROM PolicyMakers WHERE policy_risk_score > 50;
SELECT policy_maker_name, policy_risk_score FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY policy_risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers WHERE policy_maker_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT policy_maker_name, COUNT(*) FROM PolicyMakers GROUP BY policy_maker_name;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY policy_risk_score DESC, policy_maker_name ASC;
SELECT policy_maker_id, policy_maker_name FROM PolicyMakers WHERE policy_risk_score > 50;
SELECT policy_maker_name, policy_risk_score, COUNT(*) FROM PolicyMakers GROUP BY policy_maker_name, policy_risk_score;
SELECT policy_maker_id, policy_maker_name, jsonb_array_length(historical_data->'events') AS event_count FROM PolicyMakers WHERE policy_risk_score < 30;
SELECT jsonb_pretty(historical_data) AS historical_data_formatted FROM PolicyMakers WHERE policy_maker_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT name, position FROM PolicyMakers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, position FROM PolicyMakers WHERE affiliation = 'Government';
SELECT * FROM PolicyRisks WHERE risk_type = 'Financial';
SELECT id, risk_id, risk_description FROM PolicyRisks ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, position, affiliation FROM PolicyMakers WHERE position = 'CEO';
SELECT * FROM PolicyRisks WHERE risk_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY risk_id DESC;
SELECT name, position, affiliation, id FROM PolicyMakers WHERE affiliation LIKE '%Corporation%';
SELECT * FROM PolicyRisks WHERE risk_description ILIKE '%data breach%' AND risk_type = 'Cybersecurity' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRisks WHERE risk_type = 'Operational' ORDER BY risk_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM policies WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, policy_id, analysis_date FROM policy_analysis ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_id FROM policy_data WHERE data_value > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM policy_data GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policies WHERE effective_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT p.policy_name, pd.data_description, pa.analysis_date FROM policies p INNER JOIN policy_data pd ON p.policy_id = pd.policy_id INNER JOIN policy_analysis pa ON p.policy_id = pa.policy_id WHERE pa.risk_score > 80;
SELECT p.policy_id, pd.data_value FROM policies p LEFT JOIN policy_data pd ON p.policy_id = pd.policy_id;
SELECT DISTINCT p.policy_name, pa.risk_score FROM policies p INNER JOIN policy_analysis pa ON p.policy_id = pa.policy_id ORDER BY pa.analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT name, position FROM PolicyMakers WHERE agency='Government';
SELECT event_date, data_description FROM HistoricalData ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT risk_description, impact FROM PolicyRisks WHERE risk_category='Environmental';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM RiskAnalysis WHERE policy_maker_id=1 AND risk_id=2;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT name, position FROM PolicyMakers WHERE position='CEO';
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, risk_category, impact FROM PolicyRisks ORDER BY risk_category ASC;
SELECT data_id, event_date, data_description FROM HistoricalData WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT pm.name, pr.risk_description, ra.analysis_result FROM PolicyMakers pm JOIN RiskAnalysis ra ON pm.policy_maker_id = ra.policy_maker_id JOIN PolicyRisks pr ON ra.risk_id = pr.risk_id WHERE ra.analysis_result='High Risk';
SELECT * FROM policy_makers;
SELECT policy_maker_name, department FROM policy_makers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT policy_maker_name, role FROM policy_makers ORDER BY policy_maker_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(impact) AS max_impact_risk FROM historical_data;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(strategy_id) AS num_strategies FROM mitigation_strategies GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_maker_name, role FROM policy_makers WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE impact > 1000 ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, analysis_date FROM policy_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, risk_description, risk_likelihood FROM policy_risks ORDER BY risk_likelihood DESC;
SELECT policy_id, strategy_description, implementation_date FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
